title: Service definition process - Business rules
content:
The service definition workflow relies on a simple business rule that applies to these phases:

  • Plan
  • Build
  • Operate
  • Decommission
  • Retired
Event Condition Service Management action
Entering Set Catalog status to Inactive/Active Sets the Catalog status field to Inactive or Active, depending on the phase.

Related topics

  • Service Portfolio Management
  • Service definitions
  • Service definition workflow
  • Processes and Rules
